nodes.text: The widow Gervruche was the wife of Gervruche, a Special Projects Consultant for the Imperial Correctional Facilities Ministry. When Gervruche was killed, Lady Chawkroft assumed his position at the Ministry and relayed the condolences of Ilm Vaz-Weplinn, Gervruche's Corporate Sector Authority colleague to her. Gervruche's widow expressed her thanks to Chawkroft, which Chawkroft later communicated to Vaz-Weplinn.
